text: Konstantinos "Kostas" Politis (; 21 March 1942 – 18 June 2018) was a Greek professional basketball player and coach. He was born in Athens. Politis played with Panathinaikos, and with them he won 3 Greek League championships, in the years 1967, 1969, and 1971. Politis also played with the senior men's Greek national basketball team. Politis died on 18 June 2018 in Athens at the age of 76.Kostas Politis, Architect of Greece’s 1987 Basketball Triumph, Dies at 76 ==References== ==Other websites== *FIBA Profile *FIBA Europe Profile Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Greek basketball players Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Kostas Politis
